channel.title: Moving your char after you light a fire, or do agility.[HELP!]
channel.description:
i was woundering if anybody could help me out with this i was trying to make somthing like this so that you move after you light a fire... but i kept getting errors, but.. i was woundering how do i make it so when you light a fire your char walks forward 1 square.
Please and thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2008, 03:25:14 pm[/size][hr]Anybody AT ALL?????
